mapper.select: SELECT faq_num, faq_title, faq_content, faq_date FROM faq ORDER BY faq_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (PAYMENT_ID, RESERVATION_ID, PAYMENT_PRICE, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_STATUS, PAYMENT_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_NONMEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{reservationId}, #{paymentPrice}, #{paymentType}, #{paymentStatus}, #{paymentTime});
